|eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305S |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=CPLD;Lattice;ispLSI2032E;Lattice, ispLSI2032E, 110LJ44, B046RR07;1; ,,, Super I/O chip;Winbond;W83877TF;Winbond, W83877TF, 051GE204105902RA;1; |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} "PWA-RHINE2/M BD." and "ASSY: 411706300105-R" is silkscreened on the mainboard in the FCC photos.
A MAC label affixed to the FCC EUT has a MAC w/ a 00:40:D0 ('''MITAC''') OUI on it.
The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a '''POTRANS''' UWP01211050AU (100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 0.5A -> 5VDC, 2A).
